verse.name: v1
verse.lines: ’Tis finished! The Messiah dies, Cut off for sins, but not His own: Accomplished is the sacrifice, The great redeeming work is done.

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
v5
v6
verse.lines: Saved from the legal curse I am, My Savior hangs on yonder tree: See there the meek, expiring Lamb! ’Tis finished! He expires for me.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Accepted in the Well-beloved, And clothed in righteousness divine, I see the bar to heaven removed; And all Thy merits, Lord, are mine.

verse.name: v8
